title: Fujifilm’s new Instax Mini 70 instant camera has a selfie mode, and it’s a mirror
text:
Fujifilm’s new Instax Mini 70 instant camera has a selfie mode, and it’s a mirror 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Fujifilm has updated its Instax Mini series of instant film cameras with a sleeker model called the Instax Mini 70. It has an improved viewf...
